content: Hello everyone here at the Bitcointalk forum!Firstly, I would like to express my gratitude to the creator of the Bitcointalk community. Long live the creator and this wonderful crypto forum!Now, let's get straight to the point. As the founder, CEO, and developer, I have been working on a crypto search engine called Bitfinder. Currently, it is still in the beta version and development mode. Therefore, I have decided to open up the platform to users for viewing and to seek support for Bitfinder. I firmly believe that without the crypto community, Bitfinder will not succeed.I am truly excited about Bitfinder as it represents a way to provide maximum exposure to the crypto space. Bitfinder aims to become the go-to search engine for all things related to cryptocurrencies, much like Google is for general search. I understand that some of you may have doubts about Bitfinder, but I assure you that we are embarking on an incredible journey. Our sole focus is on the crypto space, aiming to help numerous crypto tech companies achieve the highest quality traffic exposure through our search engine's advanced algorithm.At BitFinder, we have developed our very own crypto search crawler bot, eliminating the need for third-party search APIs in our operations. Certain Bitfinder APIs will be publicly available on Github.Currently, Bitfinder is undergoing development, and all users can access and explore it. We will provide daily updates on the progress and ensure transparency in our development process.Here are the services that Bitfinder will offer:Search Engine: Bitfinder will function as a search engine dedicated to crypto-related content. Only three sponsored ads will be displayed at any given time, rotating periodically. You can check it out here: https://bitfinder.io/search?term=cryptoPublisher Program: Publishers with crypto-based websites will have the opportunity to add Bitfinder's banners on their sites. More information can be found here: https://bitfinder.io/publisher/Advertiser Program: Advertisers can utilize the Bitfinder network to display their ads on Bitfinder search results as well as other crypto networks. https://bitfinder.io/advertiser/Paid-to-Click Ads: We will introduce affordable paid-to-click ads for advertisers, allowing clickers to earn rewards for watching ads. https://bitfinder.io/paid-to-click/Anonymous Crypto Browser: Bitfinder is also introducing an anonymous crypto browser, which is a significant advancement in the AI industry. You can find more information about it here: https://bitfinder.io/crypto-browserCrypto Games: Bitfinder will offer crypto games where players can earn cryptocurrencies.And many more services will be introduced in the future!The token associated with Bitfinder will be based on the ERC20 standard, with a total token supply of 1 billion. For more information about the token allocation, please visit our main page: https://bitfinder.ioWe have also established a profit-sharing structure for those who will participate in the pre sale private sales and public sale Between 10% to 25% depending of the net profits generated by Bitfinder Ad network that will be distributed amongst token holders that hold for 30 / 60 / 90 / 120 days. those that dont hold the longer you hold the bitfinder token the higher the profit pool shares will be.The above ad profit sharing is for those who participate buying tokens during the pre sale up until public sale ends. Profit sharing will not be distributed for users who participate after the Public sale. How ever "Fabled" accounts status holders which participated in the sale stages can be sold or transferred to another bitfinder user.Pre Sale Stage      Holders Will Receive 25% Private Sale 1       Holder Will Receive 20%Private Sale 2       Holder Will Receive 15%Public Sale           Holder Will Receive 15%To be able to receive profits holder will need to hold tokens for minimum 30 Days and the more days you hold the better the % amount will be distributed for example Preasale holders will get 25% holding for 30 days and any additional days that are 60 days will increase stake to 30% and 90 days increased to 35% and final 90 days will increase to 40% All payments will be made in USDT ERC20 or TRC20Thank you all for your attention, and I look forward to your support and feedback as we continue to develop and improve Bitfinder. Together, we can create a thriving community and contribute to the growth of the crypto space.Bitfinder members can start posting free ads from today and submit URL and gain maximum exposure for their crypto-related content. It's a great opportunity to showcase your crypto projects and services to the Bitfinder community. Remember, during this period, only ads related to cryptocurrencies will be allowed. So, take advantage of this limited-time offer and get your crypto ads up on Bitfinder now!Weblink: https://bitfinder.ioTelegram: https://t.me/bitfinderchannelTwitter:  https://twitter.com/bitfinder_ioSignup: https://bitfinder.io/sign-upWhite Paper: https://bitfinder.io/bitfinder-whitepaper.pdf

The sheer volume of data, news, updates, and developments can quickly overwhelm anyone attempting to stay on top of the game. By offering accurate and up-to-date information, Bitfinder enhances the likelihood of meaningful interactions and partnerships within the crypto ecosystem. This, in turn, fosters growth, innovation, and collaboration – all vital components of a thriving crypto space.At its core Bitfinder is more than just a search engine; it's a revolutionary tool that bridges the gap between data and understanding. Whether it's for research, investment, or staying updated, Bitfinder's algorithmic prowess ensures that users receive information that is not only relevant but also accurate.In conclusion, the Bitfinder Crypto Search Engine's introduction marks a pivotal moment in the world of cryptocurrencies.. Its potential to revolutionise how individuals, projects, and investors interact with crypto-related data is unparalleled. By offering a streamlined, accurate, and insightful experience, Bitfinder paves the way for a more informed and connected crypto community. As the crypto industry continues to evolve, Bitfinder stands as a beacon of information discovery, illuminating the path forward in this exciting digital frontier.Let's extend our reach beyond the crypto sphere.Picture a section on Bitfinder where crypto services are up for grabs – think crypto video reviews, crypto social exposure, and a marketplace for crypto influencers.
